grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 顧客【コキャク】customer, client, patron
一顧【イッコ】(take no) notice of
後顧【コウコ】looking back, worry, anxiety
kun reading compounds: 顧みる【かえりみる】to look back on (the past), to reflect on, to reminisce about, to look behind (at), to turn round (and look), to look over one's shoulder, to consider, to concern oneself about, to take notice of, to pay attention to, to take into consideration
